sentences.en: "His eyes were glassy?"— 'And dilated. They were watery.' — 'Thank you.'
sentences.cn: “他的眼神呆滞？”——“还双眼圆睁，泪汪汪的。”——“谢谢！”

sentences.en: At first glance, calcite might be confused with quartz where both are clear, colorless, and " glassy ".
sentences.cn: 乍一看来, 方解石可能与石英相混淆,因为两者都是透明 、 无色 、 且 “ 呈玻璃状 ” 的.

sentences.en: Be careful of the icy pavement; it's really glassy , ie slippery.
sentences.cn: 小心人行道上有冰, 路面可真滑.
哈特张开了眼睛,目光呆滞.

sentences.en: He gazed at the street with dull, glassy eyes.
sentences.cn: 他呆滞 、 无神的双眼凝视着那街道.

sentences.en: He shows the human situation, however glassy its superficial look, to be comfortless.
sentences.cn: 他显示人类的处境表面尽管光润, 其实复杂而乏味.

sentences.en: He was very still, his eyes glassy.
Henry gave Paul a glassy-eyed stare.
His glassy eyes and his ashy face were alight in an instant.
sentences.cn: 他那没光的眼睛和苍白的脸,登时就神采奕奕.
它是呆滞的, 不动的, 无表情的.

sentences.en: She revealed some trays of glassy titbits.
sentences.cn: 她给我看了装满几个托盘的透明的美味珍品.

sentences.en: She went out into the street, geometric blocks of hot , glassy light and concrete shadow.
sentences.cn: 她出来到街上, 见到一块块是几何图案的热辣辣的, 亮晶晶的阳光和实实在在的阴影.

sentences.en: The water was glassy and motionless reflecting tint by tint of the Indian ink sky above.
sentences.cn: 水面波平如镜,深深淡淡地反映着天空墨水似的颜色.

sentences.en: We skated on the glassy surface of the frozen pond.
sentences.cn: 我们在池塘光滑的冰上溜冰.

words.tran_cn: 玻璃厂；玻璃制品；玻璃制造业

trans.tran_cn: 似玻璃的，像玻璃一样光滑的，（眼神）呆滞的，无生气的
trans.tran_en: If you describe something as glassy, you mean that it is very smooth and shiny, like glass
